Package nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.gp22.app

Interface Model

public interface Model
Model class, which stores information on the game state.

  • Method Details

    • timeLeft

      int timeLeft()
      Gets the time left in the game.
      Returns:
      time left in timer

    • decrementTime

      void decrementTime()
      Decreases timer.

    • player

      Player player()
      Gets the player character of the game.
      Returns:
      player character

    • entities

      List<Entity> entities()
      Gets the list of entities in the level.
      Returns:
      List of entities

    • recorder

      GameRecorder recorder()
      Gets the recorder for the level.
      Returns:
      GameRecorder object that is recording the level

    • remove

      void remove(Entity e)
      Removes an entity from the entity list.
      Parameters:
      e - entity to be removed.

    • onGameOver

      void onGameOver()
      Action to perform once game is lost.

    • onNextLevel

      void onNextLevel()
      Action to perform once game has been completed.

    • totalTreasures

      long totalTreasures()
      Gets the total number of treasures at the start of the level.
      Returns:
      number of treasures that were at the start of the level

    • levelNumber

      int levelNumber()
      Gets the current level number.
      Returns:
      the current level number

    • treasuresLeft

      default long treasuresLeft()
      Returns the number of Treasures left in the level. This number will change as the player collects treasures in the level.
      Returns:
      number of treasures in the entities list

    • saveGame

      default void saveGame()
      Saves the current game to an xml file in the format: "saveGame" + timeStamp.

    • ping

      default void ping()
      One step of the game. "Pings" each entity in the model, ie each entity performs whatever their designated action is for each step of the game.
